official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 15, 1966 (80 Stat. 915), as amended, establishing a program for the preservation of additional historic property throughout the nation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1992 through 1996 for the Advisory Council on Historic Preservation.
